abstract: Boeing plans to submit its bid on Friday as its supporters question whether Airbus has a cost advantage because of European aid.
snippet: Boeing plans to submit its bid on Friday as its supporters question whether Airbus has a cost advantage because of European aid.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  The European Aeronautic Defense and Space Company submitted an 8,800-page bid on Thursday for a $35 billion Air Force tanker contract amid tensions over whether European subsidies would give it a cost advantage over Boeing.

headline.main: European Plane Maker Submits Bid for U.S. Tankers
headline.print_headline: European Plane Maker Submits Bid for U.S. Tankers

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
